mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(book_title, book_price, book_publisher, book_author, book_publishingDate, book_category, book_content, book_stock, book_pictureUrl, book_thumbUrl) VALUES (#{bookTitle}, #{bookPrice}, #{bookPublisher}, #{bookAuthor}, #{bookPublishingDate}, #{bookCategory}, #{bookContent}, #{bookStock}, #{bookPictureUrl}, #{bookThumbUrl});
